question_text: Which of the following are consequences of using mismatched battery form factors in laptops? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Battery will not fit into the compartment
Laptop may boot but not charge the battery
correct_answer: Battery will not fit into the compartment
Laptop may boot but not charge the battery
explanation: Using a mismatched form factor can result in improper fit, electrical incompatibility, and unreliable connections.
